EmailTemplate.subject: EuroCIS 2022: Will you be in Düsseldorf next week?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Ready to see what’s in store for this year? With EuroCIS 2022 just a couple of days away, we’re eager to share the innovations that can simplify your store operations. At Stand 10/A04, we’ll be sharing how our open platform gives you a full set of tools to serve your customers from online to in-store. Come interact with our advanced retail technology and see the services that prepare retailers to grow along with the industry. Before you arrive in Düsseldorf, take a minute to schedule a one-on-one meeting <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/eurocis-2022]]> with a member of our team to talk about how you can simplify your operations and get the edge on your competitors.
